attributes.action: stop details on the electoral register from being made available to third parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The electoral register should only be used for purposes of voting and should not be used as a database for third parties to access our details.  Although the option of placing a tick in a box to prevent your details from being used by others exist, this is often overlooked and so your details are made available to all and sundry.  The option of placing a tick should be if you WANT TO ALLOW others to see your detals.
